name: getBytes(_:maxLength:usedLength:encoding:options:range:remaining:)
desc: Gets a given range of characters as bytes in a specified encoding.
declaration:
func getBytes(_ buffer: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, 
    maxLength maxBufferCount: Int, 
   usedLength usedBufferCount: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>?, 
     encoding: UInt, 
      options: NSString.EncodingConversionOptions = [], 
        range: NSRange, 
    remaining leftover: NSRangePointer?) -> Bool
